brainly_data.question:
Which two sentences show that the rich man is annoyed? 

The boy looked up at the rich man and said, "My father has gone to cut living trees and plant dead ones. My mother is at the market, selling the wind and buying the moon." "What?" the rich man yelled. He waved his bamboo walking stick in the air. "Tell me where your parents are immediately! And no tricks!" The boy repeated his answer. The color rose to the rich man's face.
brainly_data.subject: English
